text: Vincenzo Nibali (; born 14 November 1984) is an Italian professional road bicycle racer. He rides for UCI WorldTeam. He was born in Sicily. His biggest wins are the 2010 Vuelta a Espa√±a, the 2014 Tour de France and the Giro d'Italia twice (2013 and 2016), making him one of seven cyclists who have won the three Grand Tours in their career. ==References== Category:Italian cyclists Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Olympians for Italy
title: Vincenzo Nibali
